category.title: "Faggot"
category.description: Use of the word fag or faggot as a degrading slur

category.title: "Downie"
category.description: The use of downie as a degrading slur

category.title: "Lesbian"
category.description: The use of lesbian or any form of it (lesbo, dyke, butch) as a degrading slur

category.title: "Gay"
category.description: Use of the word gay out of context, and in a degrading fashion

category.title: "Homo"
category.description: Use of the word homosexual or homo as a degrading slur

category.title: "Retarded"
category.description: The use of retard or any variation of the word retard used out of context as a degrading slur
